title: The Heart of Mid-Lothian, Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: * The hilly pastures of Buckholm, which the Author now surveys,--"Not inthe frenzy of a dreamer's eye,"--are famed for producing the bestewe-milk cheese in the south of Scotland.
